Java中用js解析json

Feb 22, 2015

 java  ScriptEngineManager  Java  javascript

在java中如何解析json？fastjson？jackson？那未免太无趣了

其实我们可以试试ScriptEngine

 1public class NashornTest {
 2
 3    private static String json = "[{name:'A',age:'18'},{name:'B',age:'19'},{name:'C',age:'30'}]";
 4
 5    private static String script =
 6            "function parse(json){" +
 7            "   var names = new Array();" +
 8            "   for(var i in json){" +
 9            "       names.push(json[i].name);" +
10            "   }" +
11            "   return names;" +
12            "};" +
13            "parse(" + json + ");";
14
15    public static void main(String[] args) throws ScriptException {
16        ScriptEngineManager manager = new ScriptEngineManager();
17        ScriptEngine engine = manager.getEngineByName( "JavaScript" );
18
19        Map<String,String> result = (Map<String,String>)engine.eval(script);
20        result.forEach((k,v) -> System.out.println(v));
21    }
22}

输出:

A

B

C

代码中使用了 lambda
